channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: House Republicans propose $5 billion for private school vouchers
item.description: House Republicans want to set aside up to $5 billion a year for scholarships to help families send their children to private and religious schools, marking an unprecedented effort to use public money to pay for private education.

item.title: Campus protests flare on a smaller scale than last spring, but with higher stakes
